shader.description: Specifies the location of the shader resource file to use.
shader.markdownDescription: Specifies the location of the shader resource file to use.

toggleable.description: Determines if the applied shader can be toggled.
toggleable.markdownDescription: Determines if the applied shader can be toggled.

type.description:
[Power Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/shader)

Applies a post-processing shader to the vision of the entity that has the power.

Type ID: `origins:shader`

!!! note

    For more information about post-processing shaders, visit [Minecraft Wiki: Shaders (Before 1.9)](https://minecraft.wiki/w/Shaders/Before_1.9)
type.markdownDescription:
[Power Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/shader)

Type ID: `origins:shader`
